content: मानुष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मनोरयं अण् सुक् च] {@--1@} Human; मानुषी तनुः, मानुषी वाक् &c.; <ls>R. 1. 60</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 22</ls>; <ls>Bg. 4. 12</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">9. 11</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 124.</ls> {@--2@} Humane, kind. --षः {@--1@} A man, human being. {@--2@} An epithet of the three signs of the zodiac, Gemini, Virgo, and Libra. --षी {@--1@} A woman. {@--2@} A branch of medicine, administering drugs and herbs. --षं {@--1@} Humanity. {@--2@} Human effort or action.
